DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin B12and n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFA ) decrease blood homocysteine ( Hcy ) concentration . However , combine effect nutrient Hcy ferritin , C-reactive protein limit inconclusive . The objective examine synergistic effect vitamin B12 combination n-3 PUFA plasma Hcy , ferritin , biochemical marker . In randomized controlled trial , thirty eligible subject randomly divide three group , assign receive 1000 μg vitamin B12 , 2g fish oil , 1000 μg vitamin B12 2g fish oil respectively 8 week . Plasma phospholipid ( PL ) fatty acids biochemical marker determine . hypothesize combination vitamin B12 fish oil synergistic effect lower plasma concentration Hcy ferritin .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin B12 n-3 Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids Plasma Homocysteine
